articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a congratulatory message to Xi Jinping, president of the People's Republic of China (PRC), Saturday.
					 Kim Jong Un in his message warmly congratulated Xi Jinping upon his reelection as president of the PRC and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC at the First Session of the 13th National People's Congress.
					
					 The message hoped that the Chinese people would achieve bigger success in building socialism with the Chinese characteristics for a new era under the guidance of the Communist Party of China with Xi Jinping at the core.
					
					 Expressing belief that the bilateral relations would develop in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries, the message wished the Chinese president big success in his responsible work.

articles.title: DPRK FM Pays Courtesy Call on Swedish PM
articles.content:
DPRK FM Pays Courtesy Call on Swedish PM
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho visited the Kingdom of Sweden from March 15 to 17.
					 He paid a courtesy call on Stefan Lofven, prime minister of Sweden, and had talks with Margot Elisabeth Wallstrom, Swedish foreign minister.
					
					 The issue of bilateral relations and other issues of mutual concern were discussed at the courtesy call and talks.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Anti-Imperialist Struggle
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Anti-Imperialist Struggle
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The world progressive peoples should keep a firm anti-imperialist and independent stand and dynamically struggle against the imperialists to defend independence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article, which goes on:
					
					 The independent world is the world free from domination, subjugation, aggression and interference in which the sovereignty and equality are ensured for all the countries and nations.
					
					 If the interference and domination by foreign forces are allowed and one's destiny is not hewed out independently, one can not but become neo-colonial slave of the imperialists.
					
					 The imperialists are the biggest obstacles as they imprudently abuse the sovereignty of other countries and dignity of nations and check the struggle of the countries to build a new society.
					
					 They have ceaselessly committed military interference and aggressive acts against sovereign states in all parts of the world to satisfy their cupidity.
					
					 Aggression and domination are ineffective before the strength of the unity. That's why the imperialists have enforced the policy for division and estrangement to easily realize aggression, domination and subordination on other countries.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to get united and cooperate with all countries and nations aspiring after independence and loving justice, irrespective of differences in ideology and social system, with broad magnanimity and generosity.
					
					 To strengthen the international solidarity makes one take common steps in the struggle for independence against the imperialists in line with the common aspiration for independence and thus strengthen its might.

articles.title: Bird Flu Occurs in Kyonggi Province, S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Occurs in Kyonggi Province, S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Bird flu occurred in Kyonggi Province, south Korea on March 16, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 An inspection of a chicken farm in Phyongthaek City on the same day revealed bird flu virus.
					
					Earlier, bird flu occurred at a chicken farm in Yangju City which purchased chickens from the farm in Phyongthaek on March 15.

articles.title: Police's Act of Misleading Public Opinion Exposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Police's Act of Misleading Public Opinion Exposed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the police misled public opinion through website during traitor Lee Myung Bak's rule, according to the south Korean MBC on March 12.
					 Such contents were contained in the police's documents worked out in 2011.
					
					 The broadcasting said that "a hidden hand misleading the internet public opinion in the period of Lee Myung Bak regime was revealed and the police distorted the voices of the people and made false voices."

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Kyrgyzstan
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan on March 12.
					A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the 106th birth anniversary of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Internet magazines and homepages of different countries and regions featured articles to observe the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They are illustrated with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and his photos.
					
					 Russia's online magazine Lemchich praised him as the genuine leader of the people who always firmly believed them and led the country by depending on their strength.
					
					 The Russian internet homepage Today's DPRK noted he achieved exploits to be recorded in history by pursuing original Songun politics.
					
					 Other homepages of Russia and the homepages of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy and the Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty noted that Kim Jong Il dedicated himself to the country and the people.
					
					 Homepages of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, the International Friendship Initiative "Explore DPRK" of Poland, the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics and the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria praised the ideological and theoretical exploits and Songun leadership exploits 
					
					Kim Jong Il performed for the times and history.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Iran
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Iran
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed by the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran on March 12.
					A vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee set a celebration period from March 12 to April 18 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and briskly conduct the work for introducing and disseminating the achievements gained by the Korean army and people in building a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, envio el dia 17 un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Republica Popular China, Xi Jinping.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Le extiendo sinceras felicitaciones por su reeleccion como Presidente de la RPCh y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh en la primera sesion de la 13a legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de China.
					
					Espero que el pueblo chino logre mayores exitos en la construccion del socialismo con peculiaridades chinas de la nueva epoca bajo la guia del Partido Comunista de China, centrado en Vd. 
					
					Convencido de que las relaciones Corea-China se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses comunes de ambos pueblos, formulo votos por los grandes exitos en sus responsabilidades.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho se reune con el premier y la cancillera de Suecia
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho se reune con el premier y la cancillera de Suecia
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, visito al Reino de Suecia desde el dia 15 hasta el 17.
					Durante su permanencia, el realizo una visita de cortesia al premier sueco Stefan Lofven y converso con su homologa sueca Margot Elisabeth Wallstrom.
					
					En las ocasiones se debatieron el problema de relaciones bilaterales y otros de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a dinamizar la lucha antiimperialista
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a dinamizar la lucha antiimperialista
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual divulgado este domingo, el diario Rodong Sinmun adelanta que los pueblos progresistas del mundo deben dar auge a la lucha por rechazar el imperialismo y defender la independencia con la firme posicion antiimperialista e independiente.
					El mundo independiente es el libre de dominacion, subyugacion, agresion e intervencion donde sean garantizadas la soberania y la igualdad de todos los paises y naciones, precisa el articulista y continua:
					
					Si un pais tolera la intervencion y la dominacion de las fuerzas extranjeras sin forjar su destino de manera dependiente, se convertira en el esclavo neocolonial de los imperialistas.
					
					Estos ultimos son peores obstaculos que impiden la lucha de otros paises por construir una nueva sociedad violando la soberania y la dignidad nacional.
					
					Para satisfacer su voracidad, recurren a la intervencion militar y la agresion contra los Estados soberanos en todas partes del mundo.
					
					La agresion y la dominacion se malogran ante el poder de la unidad. Por eso, los imperialistas practican obstinadamente la politica de meter cunas para facilitar la agresion, la dominacion y la subyugacion a otros paises.
					
					La RPDC tiene la posicion invariable de lograr con magnanimidad la unidad y cooperacion con todos los paises y naciones, aspirantes a la independencia y amantes de la justicia, por encima de las diferencias de ideas y regimenes.
					
					El crecimiento de la solidaridad internacional posibilita tomar accion conjunta en la lucha por la independencia antiimperialista basandose en la aspiracion comun a la vida independiente.
